properties.entry: INSERT INTO TB_CART ( CA_NO , BK_NO_CA , MEM_NO_CA , AMOUNT , TOTAL_PRICE , BK_TITLE , AUTHOR , ORIGIN_PRICE , PRICE , MAIN_IMG , INSERT_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_CNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE )

SELECT CA_NO , BK_NO_CA , MEM_NO_CA , AMOUNT , TOTAL_PRICE , STATUS , BK_TITLE , AUTHOR , ORIGIN_PRICE , PRICE , MAIN_IMG FROM TB_CART JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (MEM_NO_CA = MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_NO_CA = ? ORDER BY INSERT_DATE DESC
